name: HEARTSTRING (IndigoSane, ultimatecrablord, willowispies, chemicahl, westonwright, ed1c24)
name_original: HEARTSTRING (IndigoSane, ultimatecrablord, willowispies, chemicahl, westonwright, ed1c24)
description:
Control each character with WASD and Arrow Keys to avoid spikes and saws that will sever their Heartstring. Play with a friend, or play by yourself for an extra challenge!

TEAM RESIDENT SLEEPERS PRESENT:
